title: Just impossible to use
text:
The map and location targeting isn‚Äôt easy to use ‚Äî so you end up with a bunch of tiles which you don‚Äôt know if they‚Äôre a couple minutes away or in another state. I live in NJ and it keeps picking up in NY where the more adoption but unless you‚Äôre familiar with the places you‚Äôve no idea what you‚Äôre getting or where to go

Nice idea but brutal implementation - I feel like the learning curve requires you to familiarize yourself with everything in your 20 mi radius - which absolutely defeats the purpose

The right thing at the right place at the right time - if you can‚Äôt do that you should be deploying apps ‚Ä¶.

title: Too good to go -bad
text:
The restaurant and bakery gave me stuff I could easily get at Walmart reduced rate food.
The bakery gave 4 small tasteless desserts and a loaf of baguette bread.
The Italian restaurant I ordered from the restaurant and another order from the pizzeria.
They gave me 5 slices of pizza from under the heat lamp.  I said I paid for two orders, and they said you got it all in the pizza box.
Don‚Äôt waste your money and time for this stuff!!!

title: First time using app
text: I was pleasantly surprised. They gave me two boxes of pizza and it was a good amount of food. The restaurant was only six minutes away and I was able to find parking. Will use again.

title: Frustrating
text: I Would dearly love it if this app worked consistently, but it doesn‚Äôt. The ‚Äúvegan‚Äú option in the user profile does nothing. The providers evidently never see it and are not bound in anyway to accommodate it. I‚Äôve found that I have to be careful to look over any store‚Äôs entire menu because if there‚Äôs anything on it that I wouldn‚Äôt eat it doesn‚Äôt make any sense to pay for something that I‚Äôm going to throw away anyway. ‚ÄúSaving a meal‚Äù should mean an actual meal. I get that lots of donut places have leftovers and I wouldn‚Äôt expect to pick up a meal there. But if I go into a vegan establishment expecting to pick up a ‚Äúmeal‚Äú and being told by the app that I‚Äôve just saved ‚Äúa meal‚Äúbut I get eight chocolate bars, that doesn‚Äôt work at all. One way to look at the upshot of all of this is that the app is for people who want to save a meal but who have the money to gamble on whether or not they will actually get some thing that will sustain them. I hate to think of someone who‚Äôs using the app because they actually need to save some money on food and they end up with chocolate bars. And another layer of aggravation is there‚Äôs one restaurant who I believe actually tries to put together amigo and does their best to avoid ingredients that might elicit an allergic response. So sometimes it does work, but it‚Äôs just once out of the half dozen experiences.

title: Don‚Äôt do it
text:
I‚Äôve bought seven bags, picked up three. 

1- the second bag i bought from Boston‚Äôs was canceled when i was already omw
2- the first bag i bought from Nadine‚Äôs was closed when i tried to pick it up.
2- both first bags from FROST were unable to be picked up because they were closed. 

Every time i had to write customer service for a refund, they sent me an email saying someone will review and get back to me, to see if I‚Äôm eligible for a refund, even though i included a picture as proof and sent it during the time i was supposed to pick it up. 

No refunds issued. No return communication. Oldest over a week ago. There‚Äôs no customer support, only business support, so definitely do this if you‚Äôre a business‚Äîsounds like they take good care of you, and you might get money even if the customer doesn‚Äôt get a bag!

Gross.

title: Deleting app.
text:
I missed my slot yesterday due to circumstances out of my control. I went in the help section under "missed slot" thinking I could credit what I paid, for today.  I got an email last night from you saying that you were just going to keep my money. It's not really saving me anything if your company is commiting theft from customers.  I usually try a service a few times before I refer others. This app showed it's true intentions by the 3rd time I used it. So no referrals. Also, I am absolutely, without a doubt deleting this app. I'm also in the process of creating content that will tell the truth about what you did. Opinions are null. I'm on vacation from work. So I have 7 days of effort to put into my content. I have time to look up content that others have created and tell them what happened as well. Or..... hopefully I'll see a refund. ATP it's not about the amount of money. It's about keeping money that you are not entitled to. I hope this review discourages many from downloading.  If an order cannot be picked up, how are you all able to keep someone else's money?
Just as you thanked me after you kept my money. Thanks...I guess?

title: Map View Browse
text:
This seems to be a great app on first browse, but I found a gap. I don‚Äôt have a car & stick to the train, so I‚Äôm looking for things walking distance from train stops. 

I have my location set, & the tile view looks neat & with proper contrast. However I‚Äôd like to see things from a map view to trace the train. If that‚Äôs a big ask for devs or $, the tile view has no visible addresses (though I saw a couple on small supermarket tiles). That would be a low cost adjustment & help a little. 

It seems like there‚Äôs enough space & proper context if you add it after the pick up times since space is an issue around the business name. Good luck on your great service!

title: Not Worth Your Time

title: Wasted money‚Ä¶
text:
Terrible customer service. No real person responded to me and my follow up on the matter was ignored and instead I was asked to write a review! Well, here you go.
I placed an order DURING the pick up window, due to terrible traffic (I was just a mile away), I could not make it in time to pick up my order. The restaurant even closed at the end of the pick up window. I was told via email that I should have cancelled my order 2 hours prior to the pick up window. How!? I placed my order within the pick up window! Make this make sense. Everything is time stamped right? I used this app to save money, and it ended up being wasted. Won‚Äôt be using this anymore.

title: EBT suggestion
text: I just started using this app and I really love it!! I‚Äôve gotten two surprise bags so far and they were both super good and a lot of food. I just wanted to make one suggestion that you also make it accessible for folks to pay via EBT (food stamps) and give a discount for people using them, so that those most acutely hit by food insecurity can access this.
